summary: The document is a segment from the John F. Kern Records Collection, specifically tied to the JFK Assassination System Identification Form. It details information regarding a DOD-affiliated individual and investigations into incidents, featuring a reproduced letter by Cecil L. Griggs. Although the document is unclassified, it was disseminated with certain redactions. It focuses on Kenneth C. Griggs, mentioning his adoptive father and referencing a letter from November 1967.
key_findings: The document is associated with the JFK Assassination System Identification Form within the John F. Kern Records Collection.
It involves DOD-affiliated personnel and explores incident investigations.
A notable inclusion is a copy of a letter authored by Cecil L. Griggs, pertaining to Kenneth C. Griggs.
Despite its unclassified status, the document was released with excisions.
It provides insights into Kenneth C. Griggs's adoptive father and cites a November 1967 letter.
